com.revature.models.RUser

    • Uses of RUser in com.revature.controllers

      Methods in com.revature.controllers that return RUser 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RUser LoginController.getSession(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Perform a GET request to the endpoint /session to get the current id of the logged in user.
      static RUser UserController.getUserByUsername(java.lang.String username)
      This controller returns to the frontend a user whose username matches the path variable passed in the url .
      RUser LoginController.login(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Perform a POST request to the endpoint /login to login and have a session.
      static RUser UserController.updateProfile(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String pswd)
      This method will update the user attached to the userId passed in the request body using the other parameters passed.
      Methods in com.revature.controllers that return types with arguments of type RUser 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<RUser> UserController.getAllChefs()
      To get all Users with Chef status simply call this method with getChefs appended to the url.
      static java.util.List<RUser> UserController.getAllDefaultUsers()
      This method will return all default users in the database.
      static java.util.List<RUser> UserController.getAllUsers()
      This controller method returns all users in the database as a JSON object to be handled by the view in our component.ts
      static java.util.List<RUser> UserController.getUsernames()
      This controller method returns all usernames in the database as a JSON object to be handled by the view in our component.ts it is intended to be used to provide a more reactive way to confirm the availability of a username when a user is creating a profile.
